title: Metalearning in Time Series Ensembles
text:
Get Hourly SPY Data Since 1/1/22

import yfinance as yf

data = yf.download('SPY','2022-01-01','2023-09-30', interval ="60m")
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%matplotlib inline

data['Adj Close'].plot()
plt.ion()
